login.title: Log in
login.intro: Welcome to the Guild of Physics Voting Machine! Log in by entering your login code in the field below. If you don't have a login code yet, please inform the election officials.
login.intro_2: Only regular members of the guild are allowed to vote. If you have received a login code but are not a regular member, please inform the election officials immediately. In this case, the login code you received will be invalidated.
login.code_description: You will receive a login code from the election officials. It will be invalidated if you leave the election meeting. You will need a new code if you return to vote.
login.alias_description: Your alias will be visible to the election officials. You can use your real name or come up with something else.
login.notice: Always remember to inform the election officials of your code when you leave!

vote.title: Voting
vote.no_ongoing_election_description: You will be informed when voting starts and you can refresh the page
vote.vote_instruction: Select the candidates in the order you prefer and press "Vote" to vote

voter_management.title: Voter management
voter_management.generate_new_code_description: A voter code is a unique code given to a voter.
voter_management.remove_code_description: Are you sure you want to remove the voter code?

previous_results.title: Previous results
previous_results.no_previous_results_description: There are no previous results to show
